scripts.extract: npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/default.json --output ./content/i18n/default.po && npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/de-DE.json --output ./content/i18n/de-DE.po && npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/es-ES.json --output ./content/i18n/es-ES.po && npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/fr-FR.json --output ./content/i18n/fr-FR.po && npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/nl-NL.json --output ./content/i18n/nl-NL.po && npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/pt-PT.json --output ./content/i18n/pt-PT.po && npx po-transformer po --input ./content/schemas/ru-RU.json --output ./content/i18n/ru-RU.po
scripts.emails: echo 'Enter email' && read email && MESSAGEONE='Compiling template: ' && MESSAGETWO='./content/emails/' && echo $MESSAGEONE $MESSAGETWO$email'/index.mjml' && mjml ./content/emails/$email/index.mjml -o ./content/emails/$email/index.html
